put.summary: Upsert (update when the candidate exists or add new candidate otherwise) a batch of new candidates. TenantSpecificInfo properties are updated in the merge mode: if the update command doesn't contain existing field then its old value will be kept. To remove existing value of some TenantSpecificInfo f
put.description: Upsert (update when the candidate exists or add new candidate otherwise) a batch of new candidates. TenantSpecificInfo properties are updated in the merge mode: if the update command doesn't contain existing field then its old value will be kept. To remove existing value of some TenantSpecificInfo field use null as a value. TenantSpecificInfo fields should be at first registered with api/External/CandidateTenantSpecificInfoReferences

delete.summary: Delete a batch of the candidates (Physically remove from database. Use PUT command to set IsDeleted flag for soft deleting)

requestBody.description: A collection of the names of candidate's additional properties (case sensitive)

post.summary: Get a batch of candidate's additional properties references
post.description: Get a batch of candidate's additional properties references

requestBody.description: A collection of candidate's additional properties references Names (case sensitive)

get.summary: Get a collection of candidate's additional properties references
get.description: Get a collection of candidate's additional properties references

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: Format - int32. Page number (1 for the first page. If 0 or less than do not use paginating and return all data)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. Page size (1 for one element on each page. If 0 or less than do not use paginating and return all data)

candidateId.description: Candidate's Id in third party CRM

email.description: E-mail for sending offers and notifications

mobilePhone.description: Mobile for sending offers and notifications if it's not empty and IsMobilePhoneValid is true

isMobilePhoneValid.description:
MobilePhone validation status.
true - MobilePhone is valid and contains number in E.164 format,
false - MobilePhone is not valid and contains original number,
null - MobilePhone is not validated yet or empty

isDeleted.description: Marked candidates are hidden, do not participate in orders, and can be physically removed from the database

isBanned.description: Marked candidates are hidden, do not participate in orders but are kept in the database

tenantSpecificInfo.description: Additional Tenant's specific candidate's properties. The key contains property's name, the value contains property's value. Only HTML-safe symbols are allowed

name.description: Field name. Case sensitive. PascalCase is necessary. Only Latin letters and digits are allowed

order.description: Sorting order for the property to show in UI in Candidate card. The properties with smaller Order value is shown on the top

showInUI.description: Show the property in UI in Candidate card. When false, the value will be stored in DB and can be used in candidate filters but will be hidden for the user

translation.description: The label text for the property in UI. Not mandatory when ShowInUI is false. Only HTML-safe symbols are allowed

CandidateTsiReferenceExternalModel.description: Describes the additional candidate's property/attribute value type

CandidateTsiReferenceType.description: List of candidate's additional property types. Do not use Unknown type in API. Integer number or string name are both suitable to specify the type of the field: Unknown = 0, String = 1, Int = 2, Boolean = 3, StringCollection = 10, IntCollection = 11

domainEvents.description: Domain events occurred. Only needed at runtime and won't be serialized neither to the DB nor to JSON.
Domain events occurred. Only needed at runtime and won't be serialized neither to the DB nor to JSON.

presentationPhoneNumber.description:
The first valid number among GlobusAI.Dedicare.Backend.Models.ContactPerson.MobilePhone and GlobusAI.Dedicare.Backend.Models.ContactPerson.OfficePhone, or empty if no
valid phone number is provided

valid phone number is provided
